Meanwhile you catch sight of the boy nearby with the large arms and legs of the man.

Your face hurts and is dripping blood. You debate what do do next.
1513222.title: Let loose on everyone here

choices: You've been caught, and get shown all the reajustments you did
15132221.content: Before you do anymore damage to people, you run to the exit, leaving everyone as they are. Your nose was bleeding along the way, your cover it up with your hand to avoid leaving too much trails. When other people, mainly hospital staffs see you, you try to get away. However, when they approach, the shadow readjust their bodies, raging from getting their body parts misplaced, swapped to other people, disassembled, cojointed, among others. Fortunately, you're getting close to the exit. You may finally get away from this place.
15132221.title: Make a grand exit

15132222.content:
The terror and hostility in the room is escalating. Another person lunges toward you. This time he tackles you with a painful jarring impact. You feel like your new body must surely have a broken bone somewhere. Perhaps it is just heavily bruised but it still hurts.

The man who tackled you throws in a few more punches. He keeps you pinned on the ground. You struggle to get up but he is stronger than you. A few security guards have come to join the fray. They all collectively keep you pinned down. The man who tackled you originally gets behind you and puts you in a sleeper hold. You start to feel yourself lose consciousness from the sleeper hold. "Get me out of here!" you almost plead to the shadow.

You feel the power surge within you as you start to black out. In nearly an instant you are across the room. In almost a sick twist of irony you are in the body of the Amanda's friend that is now disassembled.

You are too overwhelmed by the disorientation of suddenly being conscious again as well as the tension in the room to think about that at first. It takes you a while to realize that you can feel all of your body parts but that they aren't moving like they should.

"Oh god!" you cry.

The woman who had originally come to her aid was trying to comfort the man who had been re-arranged. When she heard you she turned her attention back to you. "We'll get this sorted out somehow," she said in as re-assuring of a tone as she could muster.

You watch as the security folks wrangle your unconscious body onto the floor. "I'd better go make sure he is alive so he can fix this," the woman says to you.

She rushes off to check your old body. You see a few orderlies and doctors rush in with a syringe. They inject your old body and hoist it onto a gurney.

You look around at your own scattered body parts. You wiggle your fingers and watch the detached arm in front of you wiggle the feminine fingers. You keep trying to raise your arms or move and find the failed attempts quite disconcerting.
15132222.title: The crowd gets worse

151322221.content:
You decide that you've had quite enough of being a detached jumble of body parts. You mentally assert that you should be put back together. Soon the body parts fly toward you and attach to your body in the proper places. It is strange sensation to have your borrowed body parts fly together. It is especially odd when your head flies up to your shoulders. You feel the disorienting and almost dizzy motion more fully.

Soon you are fully reattached and dizzily standing in the hallway. The woman notices this and runs toward you. "Jane!" she exclaims. "You're whole again"

You look at her with your jaw agape. You don't have to pretend to be confused. Finally you manage to stammer, "Perhaps it wore off."

The woman looks skeptical. She then looks at the man who was re-arranged and the other man and the boy who swapped limbs. Thy were still jumbled.
151322221.title: Pull yourself together

152.content:
"Well, you've got a broken leg," she tentatively tells you. You look and see that it is set in a cast. "I'll go get a doctor."

She leaves and you spend the time thinking about being attacked by that shadow. The cast and the long weeks of recovery don't concern you as much as what that thing was. Finally the Dr. comes in.

She is a middle aged woman wearing scrubs with a stethoscope around her neck. She is fairly pretty for her age but far from hot.

She smiles warmly at you as she enters the room. "You had us worried there. You were out for a while."

She does some basic tests of your vitals. Flashing a light in your eyes and a few basic questions. "Well, you seem OK." She says.

"You were out for a while. You broke your leg which we set but the fact that you were unconscious for so long without any apparent trauma is worrisome. I'd recommend that you stay here for a day or so where we can check on you before you go."

"But .." you protest.

"I really can't see anything wrong. We've already run some scans and checked for head trauma but I can't explain what happened. Could be nothing but it could be a big deal."

"I really don't want to stay here." You say.

"It is up to you of course, but if you do go at least check in with your doctor in a day or so."
152.title: Broken leg

You are Jon. A twenty four year old who doesn't really have a lot of friends or prospects in life. You become host to a weird shadow entity that has the ability to swap body parts around.

This power isn't really yours. Sometimes the shadow will act out on its own, especially if you don't use it. Nevertheless, it is quite happy to do what you want for the most part, it just wants to exercise.

Gender changes in full or part are strongly encouraged but all sorts of body swap, body part swaps, conjoinments and so forth are welcomed.

GP will be awarded for any chapters that are added. Have fun and please add!
